entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing early in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
